statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_data;
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_date, post_content FROM social_media_data;
SELECT user_id, post_date, likes FROM social_media_data WHERE comments > 5;
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM social_media_data GROUP BY influencer_id;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT post_id, user_id, post_date FROM social_media_data WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM social_media_data WHERE likes > 50 AND comments > 10 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes, SUM(comments) AS total_comments FROM social_media_data GROUP BY influencer_id ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM social_media_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_posts >= 5 ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers;
SELECT * FROM Collaborations WHERE brand_name = 'Nike';
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT brand_name, start_date, end_date FROM Collaborations ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC, influencer_name
SELECT brand_name, COUNT(collaboration_id) AS total_collaborations FROM Collaborations GROUP BY brand_name HAVING total_collaborations > 1
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, brand_name, start_date, end_date FROM Influencers JOIN Collaborations ON Influencers.influencer_id = Collaborations.influencer_id
SELECT influencer_name, ROUND(engagement_rate, 2) AS rounded_engagement_rate FROM Influencers ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY followers_count ASC, engagement_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE influencer_id = 3 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT content FROM posts WHERE influencer_id = 2 AND post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT collaborator, collaboration_type FROM collaborations ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 10000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate >= 3.50;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT collaborations.collaboration_type, posts.content FROM collaborations INNER JOIN posts ON collaborations.post_id = posts.id WHERE collaborator = 'John Doe';
SELECT influencers.name, COUNT(posts.id) AS post_count FROM influencers LEFT JOIN posts ON influencers.id = posts.influencer_id GROUP BY influencers.name ORDER BY post_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_followers FROM Influencers ORDER BY influencer_followers DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_followers > 10000;
SELECT brand_name, brand_industry FROM Brands WHERE brand_industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT brand_name, SUM(collaboration_budget) AS total_budget FROM Brands LEFT JOIN Collaborations ON Brands.brand_id = Collaborations.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_followers FROM Influencers WHERE influencer_engagement_rate > 3.5;
SELECT brand_name, brand_industry FROM Brands WHERE brand_id < 5 ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Collaborations WHERE collaboration_budget > 5000 AND collaboration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY collaboration_budget DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, post_content, post_likes FROM Influencers JOIN Posts ON Influencers.influencer_id = Posts.influencer_id WHERE post_likes > 1000;
SELECT brand_name, COUNT(*) AS total_collaborations FROM Brands JOIN Collaborations ON Brands.brand_id = Collaborations.brand_id GROUP BY brand_name ORDER BY total_collaborations DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT brand_id, collaboration_type, collaboration_date FROM Collaborations WHERE collaboration_type='Sponsored' ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC;
SELECT post_content FROM Posts WHERE influencer_id=1;
SELECT DISTINCT industry FROM Brands;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT brand_id, name, industry FROM Brands WHERE industry='Fashion' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT influencer_id, name, COUNT(*) AS num_posts FROM Posts GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING num_posts > 10 ORDER BY num_posts DESC;
SELECT p.post_id, i.interaction_type, i.interaction_date FROM Interactions i JOIN Posts p ON i.post_id = p.post_id WHERE i.interaction_type='Like' ORDER BY i.interaction_date DESC;
